alert.note: Alert for Salt Lake Valley; Wasatch Mountains I-80 North (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 29 at 4:37PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Salt Lake...eastern Davis...southwestern Morgan and western Summit Counties through 515 PM MDT... At 436 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Emigration Canyon, or 7 miles east of Bountiful. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Salt Lake City, Summit Park, Emigration Canyon, University Of Utah and Sugarhouse. This includes Interstate 80 in Utah between mile markers 129 and 139. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
